description: Past and share short source code snippets for code review

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

args.name: userName
args.info: This is the username of the user you want to login

args.name: userPass
args.info: This is the password of the user you want to login

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

args.name: code
args.info: This is the text that will be written inside your paste

args.name: apiUserKey
args.info: Use apiUserKey from createApiUserKey endpoint to own this paste. If not set, paste will be own by Guest

args.name: name
args.info: This will be the name / title of your paste

args.name: format
args.info: This will be the syntax highlighting value

args.name: private
args.info: This makes a paste public or private, public = 0, unlisted = 1, private = 2

args.name: expireDate
args.info: This sets the expiration date of your paste. There are 7 valid values available which you can use: N = Never, 10M = 10 Minutes, 1H = 1 Hour, 1D = 1 Day, 1W = 1 Week, 2W = 2 Weeks, 1M = 1 Month

blocks.name: getUserPastes
blocks.description: Listing Pastes Created By A User

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

args.name: apiUserKey
args.info: To get apiUserKey use createApiUserKey endpoint

args.name: limit
args.info: By default its set to 50, min value is 1, max value is 1000

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

blocks.name: deleteUserPaste
blocks.description: Deleting A Paste Created By A User

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.description: Getting A Users Information And Settings

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

args.name: apiUserKey
args.info: To get apiUserKey use createApiUserKey endpoint

blocks.name: getUserPastesRaw
blocks.description: Getting raw paste output of users pastes including 'private' pastes

args.name: apiDevKey
args.info: This is your API Developer Key

args.name: apiUserKey
args.info: To get apiUserKey use createApiUserKey endpoint

args.name: pasteKey
args.info: Paste key

blocks.name: getSinglePasteRaw
blocks.description: Getting raw paste output of any 'public' & 'unlisted' pastes

args.name: pasteKey
args.info: Paste key
